items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a positive start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's main indexes closed higher after choppy trading on Thursday, with the blue-chip Dow and the S&P 500 hitting one-week tops. The Dow Jones Industrial Averagerose 461.88 points, or 1.06%, to 43,870.35, the S&P 500 gained 31.60 points, or 0.53%, to 5,948.71 and the Nasdaq Composite gained 6.28 points, or 0.03%, to 18,972.42.

items.title: First Tick: Top 10 global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The GIFT Nifty is indicating a positive start for the day.

items.description: Stocks like SJVN, Infosys, Nippon Life India Asset Management, Innovators Facade Systems, and Mphasis will also be in focus on November 22.

items.description: The market may attempt to rebound amid consolidation, but it seems unsustainable given the overall negative sentiment.

items.title: Afcons Infrastructure shares in focus on project win worth Rs 1274 crore
items.description: Afcons Infrastructure Share Price | The total project cost for the Song Dam Project is Rs 1,274 crore, with an expected completion timeline of 60 months (5 years).

items.description: SJVN Share Price | SJVN plans to develop 5 GW of pumped storage projects and 2 GW of floating solar projects

items.title: Live: Will Adani Group stocks rout dampen Nifty further? | SJVN, Afcons Infra in focus | Opening Bell
items.description: Benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty returned to negative territory after the US federal court alleged Gautam Adani and 7 other group executives of bribing Indian government for securing solar energy contracts. PSU banks came under pressure as an aftermath, while IT and realty stocks outperformed. Experts now eye Nifty's support at 23,200, with resistance placed at 23,500. This morning global cues are strong. Wall Street ended higher overnight, on track for a positive week. Asia-Pacific markets also gained this morning as Japan's inflation remained above BoJ's target. Among stocks in focus, watch out for Adani Group stocks, SJVN, and Afcons Infrastructure. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Raja Venkatraman, Co-Founder NeoTrader & Trading Influencer and Hemant Shah, Fund Manager at Seven islands PMS.

items.title: Agri Picks Report November 22, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, Farmers in Karnataka have sown rabi crops over 1.3 million hectares as of Friday, down 4.1% on year, according to a release by the state's agriculture department.

items.title: For UPL stock to recover, business and leverage both need repairing
items.description: Difficult business conditions and debt taken on for acquisitions are weighing down on its performance. The pace of earnings recovery and balance-sheet deleveraging will determine stock returns

items.title: Nifty, Sensex recover as PSU bank, realty stocks boost sentiment; Positive global cues lend support
items.description: All 13 indices traded higher. The PSU Bank index was the top gainer on the bourses with gains of over a percent, recovering from yesterday's losses.

items.description: Morgan Stanley maintained an 'Equal-weight' rating on HCLTech with a target price of Rs 1,970, reflecting an upside of over 5 percent from the stock's current market price.

items.description: On November 22, international brokerage Bernstein reaffirmed its bullishness on Paytm as the narrative for the beleaguered fintech player changes from survival to optimism.
